DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To compare posterior capsule opacification ( PCO ) inhibit effect sharp posterior optic edge design Clariflex silicone intraocular lens ( IOL ) double-round edge design SI40 ( Phacoflex ) silicone IOL period 3 year . Setting : Department Ophthalmology , Medical University Vienna , Vienna , Austria . Methods : Fifty-two patient bilateral age-related cataract ( 104 eye ) include randomize , prospective , bilateral , patient- examiner-masked clinical trial intra-individual comparison . Each study patient cataract surgery eye receive SI40 IOL ( anterior posterior round optic edge ) one eye Clariflex IOL OptiEdge ( round anterior sharp posterior optic edge ) eye . Follow-up examination one week , one month , six month , one , two , three year . Digital retroillumination image take eye . The amount PCO assess subjectively slit-lamp objectively use automate image analysis software ( AQUA ) one , two , three year surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Optic Edge Design Silicone Intraocular Lens Posterior Capsule Opacification
